Google is being gamed to return antiscience results for climate-related searches. What is Google doing to fix this, and with what priority?

  • View
  • Revisions
+3
Votes

Like Wikipedia, Google can be gamed, to serve misleading information. This is happening to Google with climate change. Are the Google people concerned about this, or do they feel that popularity is a better (since easier to assess) metric than correctness, for ranking - even on an issue that matters as much and where people are as thoroughly confused as this one?
(see: http://bit.ly/tobisdist )
